com.omerozer.knit.schedulers

Interface SchedulerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidMainThreadScheduler, HeavyTaskScheduler, ImmediateScheduler, IOScheduler

    public interface SchedulerInterface
    Base interface for all schedulers Knit provides.
    See Also:
    AndroidMainThreadScheduler, ImmediateScheduler, IOScheduler, HeavyTaskScheduler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EvictorThread EVICTOR_THREAD
      Determines which schedulers are finished and should be evicted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isDone()
      Returns whether the scheduler is done or not.
      <T> void setTargetAndConsumer(SchedulerInterface schedulerInterface, Consumer consumer)
      Sets the target SchedulerInterface which will run the consume task.
      void shutDown()
      Shut-down the scheculer.
      void start()
      Start the scheduler.
      <T> void submit(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
      Accepts a Callable task into the Scheduler.
      void submit(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Accepts a Runnable task into the Scheduler.

    • Field Detail

      • EVICTOR_THREAD

        static final EvictorThread EVICTOR_THREAD
        Determines which schedulers are finished and should be evicted.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        <T> void submit(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Accepts a Callable task into the Scheduler.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the result generated by Callable
        Parameters:
        callable - Callable task.

      • submit

        void submit(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Accepts a Runnable task into the Scheduler.
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable task.

      • start

        void start()
        Start the scheduler. After this, the scheduler should be ready to accept tasks.

      • shutDown

        void shutDown()
        Shut-down the scheculer.

      • setTargetAndConsumer

        <T> void setTargetAndConsumer(SchedulerInterface schedulerInterface,
                              Consumer consumer)
        Sets the target SchedulerInterface which will run the consume task.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type that the consumer will receive.
        Parameters:
        schedulerInterface - Target scheduler to run the consume task.
        consumer - Consumer object that contains the way consume will occur.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns whether the scheduler is done or not.
        Returns:
        whether or not the task is done.
